data.title: Laetitia Ramolino Bonaparte Mother of Napoleon I
data.meta_description: Prints of Marie-Laetitia Ramolino Bonaparte Madame Mere Mother of Napoleon I, c1800-1804, (1896)
data.text:
favorite

Heritage Images Photo Prints and Wall Art

Marie-Laetitia Ramolino Bonaparte - Mother of Napoleon I, c1800-1804, (1896). Artist: T Johnson

Marie-Laetitia Ramolino Bonaparte - Madame Mere - Mother of Napoleon I, c1800-1804, (1896). Maria Letizia Buonaparte nee Ramolino [1750-1836) was an Italian noblewoman and mother of Napoleon I of France. She is shown here with a bust of her son as Caesar. Engraving after the painting made c1800-1804 by Francois Gerard. From Life of Napoleon Bonaparte, Volume IV, by William Milligan Sloane. [The Century Co. New York, 1896]

Media ID 15213446
